dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The Centerline tool from the FluvialCorridor Toolbox has been modified and included in the Geomorphic Network and Analysis Toolbox (GNAT). The modifications fix issues with 1) missing centerlines in sections of the valley bottom polygon and 2) extra centerline segments.

More documentation for the tool is available here.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Kelly Whitehead, South Fork Research, Inc.

tool.name: FluvialCorridorCenterlineTool

param.name: InputPolygon
param.dialogReference:
Should be a valley bottom polygon feature class, which is a data output of the Valley Bottom Extraction Tool (VBET).

Requirements:

  • Single part features

  • Only one feature within the polygon feature class

param.name: InputFCPolyline
param.dialogReference:
A stream network polyline feature class. The Centerline tool will create a centerline in sections of the valley bottom polygon where the stream network exists.

Requirements:

  • Line network should be contained inside the valley bottom polygon feature class input.

  • Remove any "dangles' or other artificially short line segments attached to the network. Dangles will cause extraneous centerlines to be created.

param.name: InputDisaggregationStep
param.dialogReference: Length used to split the valley bottom polygon margins when creating Thiessen polygons.

param.name: OutputFCPolyline
param.dialogReference: Output name and location of a polyline feature class containing the new centerline.

param.name: InputDeleteTempFiles
param.dialogReference: If checked, temporary processing files are deleted after the tool completes.

tool.summary:
The Centerline tool from the FluvialCorridor Toolbox has been modified and included in the Geomorphic Network and Analysis Toolbox (GNAT). The modifications fix issues with 1) missing centerlines in sections of the valley bottom polygon and 2) extra centerline segments.

More documentation for the tool is available here.
